verses.roman:
chatra, pādukā, śayyā, upādhāna, vasana
ārāma, āvāsa, yajña-sūtra, siṁhāsana

synonyms: chatra—umbrella; pādukā—slippers; śayyā—bed; upādhāna—pillow; vasana—garments; ārāma—resting chair; āvāsa—residence; yajña-sūtra—sacred thread; siṁha-āsana—throne.
translation: He serves Lord Kṛṣṇa, assuming all the following forms: umbrella, slippers, bedding, pillow, garments, resting chair, residence, sacred thread and throne.
